feature.label: Dropdown mulit level V1
feature.description:
A plugin for Design Studio 1.3/1.4 to display a hierarchy as a Dropdown menu with multi levels (cascading drop down menus). Please refer to the Read me for explanations.
GITHUB: https://github.com/franckblais/com.sample.dropdownmenumultiv1
feature.copyright: Fully usable and extendable. Please mention and refer the author and the source plugin. Author : Franck BLAIS GITHUB: https://github.com/franckblais/com.sample.dropdownmenumultiv1 email: fblais@beyondtechnologies.ca
